brief_title: A Study of Two Approved Drugs in the Treatment of Postoperative Dental Pain (0966-181)(COMPLETED)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the safety and effectiveness of two approved drugs in the treatment of pain following dental surgery.
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 1 day.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Impaction of a molar tooth requiring removal Exclusion Criteria: - Known allergies to the study drug
